author: Archie van Riemsdijk
title: Regulators to Allow Banks to Continue Using External Credit Ratings for Measuring Risk
text:
AMSTERDAM—The Basel Committee on Banking Supervision will continue allowing banks to use external credit ratings for measuring the risk level of loans to determine their regulatory capital needs, backtracking on a 2014 proposal to which banks had objected.
